products.name: Caffè Americano
products.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.
products.ingredients: Water, Brewed Espresso.

products.name: Starbucks Christmas Blonde Roast Clover Vertica
products.description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Featured Medium Roast - Pike Place Roast
products.description: From our first store in Seattle’s Pike Place Market to our coffeehouses around the world, customers requested a freshly brewed coffee they could enjoy throughout the day. In 2008 our master blenders and roasters created this for you—a smooth, well-rounded blend of Latin American coffees with subtly rich flavors of chocolate and toasted nuts, it’s served fresh every day at a Starbucks store near you.
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Christmas Blend Clover Vertica
products.description: A rich, robust blend with notes of spiced chocolate and spruce tips, making every sip velvety-smooth and oh-so-nice.
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Decaf Pike Place Roast
products.description: From our first store in Seattle’s Pike Place Market to our coffeehouses around the world, customers requested a freshly brewed coffee they could enjoy throughout the day. In 2008 our master blenders and roasters created this for you—a smooth, well-rounded blend of Latin American coffees with subtly rich flavors of chocolate and toasted nuts, it’s served fresh every day at a Starbucks store near you. (Decaf as you like it.)
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Caffè Misto
products.description: A one-to-one combination of fresh-brewed coffee and steamed milk add up to one distinctly delicious coffee drink remarkably mixed.
products.ingredients: Brewed Coffee, Milk.

products.name: Starbucks Reserve Christmas 2024 Clover Vertica
products.description: Cedar and leather aromas highlight notes of lemon zest, maple and candied ginger with a syrupy mouthfeel. Our master blenders have joined three remarkable coffees into a blend as rare and memorable as the season. Starting with hand-selected beans from Hacienda Alsacia, our farm in Costa Rica, we add perfectly aged Sumatran beans and full-bodied coffee from the Aceh region of Indonesia. A special holiday blend that pairs well with old friends and new traditions.
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Caffè Verona Clover Vertica
products.description: Well-balanced and rich with a dark cocoa texture. Try it with a piece of dark chocolate to bring out even more sweetness.
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Veranda Blend
products.description: In Latin America, coffee farms are often run by families, with their own homes on the same? land where their coffee grows. We’ve sipped coffee with these farmers for decades,? sitting on their verandas, overlooking the lush beauty of the coffee trees rolling out in the? distance. Most times it was a lightly roasted coffee like this one. It took us more than 80? tries to get it right—mellow and flavorful with a nice softness.?
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Veranda Blend Clover Vertica
products.description: We’ve spent decades working with coffee farmers throughout Latin America. This blend was inspired by the lightly roasted coffees we’ve sipped together over the years, often enjoyed on a breezy veranda with a view of lush coffee trees. Subtle but flavorful with notes of toasted sweet malt and milk chocolate, it’s an inviting, approachable coffee that mixes beautifully with milk.
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Featured Dark Roast
products.description: This full-bodied dark roast coffee has the bold, robust flavors to showcase our roasting and blending artistry.
products.ingredients: BREWED COFFEE.

products.name: Cappuccino
products.description: Dark, rich espresso lies in wait under a smoothed and stretched layer of thick milk foam. An alchemy of barista artistry and craft.
products.ingredients: MILK, BREWED ESPRESSO.

products.name: Espresso
products.description: Our smooth signature Espresso Roast with rich flavor and caramelly sweetness is at the very heart of everything we do.
products.ingredients: Brewed Espresso.

products.name: Espresso Con Panna
products.description: Espresso meets a dollop of whipped cream to enhance the rich and caramelly flavors of a straight-up shot.
products.ingredients: Brewed Espresso.

products.name: Flat White
products.description: Smooth ristretto shots of espresso get the perfect amount of steamed whole milk to create a not-too-strong, not-too-creamy, just-right flavor.
products.ingredients: Milk, Brewed Espresso.

products.name: Honey Almondmilk Flat White
products.description:
This flat white intentionally pairs almondmilk and Starbucks Blonde Espresso Roast with a hint of honey, making a perfect amount of creamy, nutty sweetness.

If Starbucks Blonde Espresso Roast is not available, Signature Espresso Roast will be substituted.
products.ingredients: ALMONDMILK [FILTERED WATER, ALMONDS, SUGAR, CALCIUM CARBONATE, SUNFLOWER LECITHIN, SEA SALT, XANTHAN GUM, GUAR GUM, VITAMIN A PALMITATE, VITAMIN D2 (ERGOCALCIFEROL)], BREWED ESPRESSO, HONEY BLEND [HONEY, WATER, NATURAL FLAVORS, POTASSIUM SORBATE, XANTHAN GUM, CITRIC ACID]

products.name: Caramel Brulée Latte
products.description: Our signature espresso, steamed milk and rich caramel brulée sauce finished with whipped cream and a supreme topping of even more caramel brulée bits.

products.ingredients: HASS AVOCADO, SEA SALT, ONION, GARLIC, JALAPENO PEPPER, LIME JUICE.

products.name: Starbucks Reserve Christmas 2024
products.description: Cedar and leather aromas highlight notes of lemon zest, maple and candied ginger with a syrupy mouthfeel. Our master blenders have joined three remarkable coffees into a blend as rare and memorable as the season. Starting with hand-selected beans from Hacienda Alsacia, our farm in Costa Rica, we add perfectly aged Sumatran beans and full-bodied coffee from the Aceh region of Indonesia. A special holiday blend that pairs well with old friends and new traditions.

products.name: Starbucks Green Apron Blend
products.description:
Notes of Honeybell Orange & Graham Cracker 

This blend is for the Starbucks “partners” who wear the iconic green apron. Made up of exceptional coffees from Latin America and Africa, this coffee is soulful and essential, bright and inspiring—just like the store baristas whose pride and passion it celebrates. Starbucks will designate funds from the sale of this coffee to our Caring Unites Partners (CUP) Fund, a Starbucks program providing grants to eligible Starbucks employees in times of need.

products.name: Starbucks Holiday Blend
products.description: Balanced between sweet and toasty, Starbucks Holiday Blend combines bright Latin American beans with rich Sumatran coffee, roasted to bring out an elegant complexity of flavor. The result is a full-bodied and vibrant blend that unfolds with layered notes of sweet maple and inviting herbs. This seasonal cup is the perfect complement to winter walks, the glow of a fireplace and the warmth of being together.

products.name: Starbucks Thanksgiving Blend
products.description: Starbucks Thanksgiving Blend is our expression of gratitude to the  world’s most distinctive coffee regions. Beans from Sumatra in Indonesia, Sidama in Ethiopia, and the Antigua region of Guatemala are expertly blended and richly roasted to create a cup that’s delicately sweet—and worthy of the finest feast. Elegantly flavorful and aromatic with notes of candied pecan, sage and dried fig, it celebrates the true spirit of the season.

products.name: Starbucks Christmas Blend Ground Coffee
products.description: For the 40th year, Starbucks Christmas Blend returns as one of our most delightful traditions. Our beloved recipe carefully combines perfectly aged Sumatran coffee with dark-roasted beans from Guatemala, Colombia and the Asia/Pacific coffee-growing region. These distinct flavors harmonize to create a rich, robust blend with notes of spiced chocolate and spruce tips, making every sip velvety-smooth and oh-so-nice. Cheers to a season of coffee together.

products.name: VIA Sweetened Iced Coffee
products.description: The refreshing coffee that's an instant summer sensation. Just add ice.

products.name: VIA Veranda Blend
products.description: A mellow blend with a soft and friendly disposition.

products.name: Starbucks VIA Instant Pike Place Roast
products.description: Inspired by the very first store we opened in Seattle’s Pike Place Market, Starbucks Pike Place Roast is a smooth, medium-roasted coffee with subtle notes of chocolate and toasted nuts.

products.name: Starbucks VIA Instant Christmas Blend
products.description: Starbucks Christmas Blend returns as one of our most delightful traditions. Our beloved recipe combines perfectly aged Sumatran coffee with dark-roasted beans from Latin America. These distinct flavors harmonize to create a rich, robust blend with notes of spiced chocolate and spruce tips, making every sip velvety-smooth and oh-so-nice. Cheers to a season of coffee together.

products.name: French Press
products.description:
Dual-filter coffee press in a matte black finish perfect for your delicious cup of morning coffee, fresh-pressed at home.
– Plastic Carafe & Lid with Tritan Carafe Liner
– Dishwasher-Safe
– Do Not Microwave
